name: Bearly Fishing (shuhmo, pxlanni, yakkocmn, JaakkoOhr)
description:
Help this unlikely duo make their way out of the forest and into the wide open seas! Your trusty fishing rod might come in handy as a grappling hook, but when the fish is out of water, make sure to splash back in or grab a bubble EVERY 10 SECONDS. If you’re feeling adventurous, try spinning to do tricks in midair! This can bearly be called fishing…

Controls

  • Left-click to jump & grapple
  • A & D to direct your movement
  • P Pause
  • R Reset

Credits

  • Shuhmo - gamedev
  • JaakkoOhr - gamedev
  • yakkocmn - music & sfx
  • Pxlanni - art
